item.title: Werewolves, vampires and lots of guns
item.author: Ivan Ho,
item.description: It’s not everyday that you get to throw your boss out of a 14th-story window, but that’s exactly how this story kicks off, and from the start till finish, it’s one heck of a thrilling roller coaster ride. No, it’s not a story about an insane, stressed accountant finally breaking down and deciding to …
